thread.title: Keepr Hosted Discussion Forges Alliance for Proactive Road Safety to Combat Drunk Driving Epidemic
thread.title_full: Keepr Hosted Discussion Forges Alliance for Proactive Road Safety to Combat Drunk Driving Epidemic

author: Mindr
title: Keepr Hosted Discussion Forges Alliance for Proactive Road Safety to Combat Drunk Driving Epidemic
text:
Denver leaders, law enforcement, tech innovators and families commit to a collective approach to keeping our roads safe through proactive efforts and behavioral change.
DENVER , Jan. 22, 2026 /PRNewswire/ -- Keepr , a brand owned by the national safety technology industry leader Mindr , convened a community discussion at the University of Denver last week to address Colorado's impaired driving crisis.
The event, titled "Our Family, Our Roads," brought together law enforcement, advocacy groups, community leaders and families, to address the crisis through proactive, community-led efforts to improve roadway safety.
Keepr hosted the Our Family, Our Roads event in Colorado in response to the impaired driving epidemic. Denver leaders, law enforcement, tech innovators and families committed to a collective approach to road safety. By leveraging proactive efforts to drive behavioral change and utilizing technology like Keepr and Keepr Drive, we are fostering a shared commitment to protect the next generation and ensure our roads are safe for the future.
